metadata.title: Ensure the appropriate MongoDB software version/patches are installed
metadata.description: Ensure the appropriate MongoDB software version/patches are installed

metadata.title: Ensure that authentication is enabled for MongoDB databases
metadata.description: Ensure that authentication is enabled for MongoDB databases

metadata.title: Ensure that MongoDB does not bypass authentication via the localhost exception
metadata.description: Ensure that MongoDB does not bypass authentication via the localhost exception

metadata.title: Ensure authentication is enabled in the sharded cluster
metadata.description: Ensure authentication is enabled in the sharded cluster

metadata.title: Ensure an industry standard authentication mechanism is used
metadata.description: Ensure an industry standard authentication mechanism is used

metadata.description: Ensure an industry standard authentication mechanism is used

metadata.description: Ensure an industry standard authentication mechanism is used

metadata.title: Ensure TLS or SSL protects all network communications
metadata.description: Ensure TLS or SSL protects all network communications

metadata.title: Ensure Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) is enabled
metadata.description: Ensure Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) is enabled

metadata.title: Ensure that system activity is audited
metadata.description: Ensure that system activity is audited

metadata.title: Ensure that audit filters are configured properly
metadata.description: Ensure that audit filters are configured properly

metadata.title: Ensure that logging captures as much information as possible
metadata.description: Ensure that logging captures as much information as possible

metadata.title: Ensure that new entries are appended to the end of the log file
metadata.description: Ensure that new entries are appended to the end of the log file

metadata.title: Ensure that MongoDB uses a non-default port
metadata.description: Ensure that MongoDB uses a non-default port

metadata.title: Ensure that MongoDB uses a non-default port
metadata.description: Ensure that MongoDB uses a non-default port

metadata.title: Ensure that server-side scripting is disabled if not needed
metadata.description: Ensure that server-side scripting is disabled if not needed

metadata.title: Ensure that key file permissions are set correctly
metadata.description: Ensure that key file permissions are set correctly

metadata.title: Ensure that database file permissions are set correctly
metadata.description: Ensure that database file permissions are set correctly

sql57_test.comment: The installed version of MongoDB is a supported version greater than or equal to 3.0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' includes a non-commented-out 'auditLog: destination: syslog'
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' file includes a non-commented-out audit filter value
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' does not include a non-commented out 'port = 27017'

file_test.comment: Ensure the Key file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the database file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'

sql57_object.comment: The installed version of MongoDB is a supported version greater than or equal to 3.0

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' includes a non-commented-out 'auditLog: destination: syslog'
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' file includes a non-commented-out audit filter value
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' does not include a non-commented out 'port = 27017'

sql57_state.comment: The installed version of MongoDB is a supported version greater than or equal to 3.0

textfilecontent54_state.comment: Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' includes a non-commented-out 'auditLog: destination: syslog'
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' file includes a non-commented-out audit filter value
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' does not include a non-commented out 'port = 27017'

file_state.comment: Ensure the Key file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the database file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'

external_variable.comment: The installed version of MongoDB is a supported version greater than or equal to 3.0
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' includes a non-commented-out 'auditLog: destination: syslog'
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' file includes a non-commented-out audit filter value
Ensure '/etc/mongod.conf' does not include a non-commented out 'port = 27017'

local_variable.comment: Ensure the Key file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the Key file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the database file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the database file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
